description: Try our easy to follow Rockmelon & Prosciutto Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cold canap√©s,Seafood free,Christmas,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Rockmelon & Prosciutto Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs extra virgin olive oil (to drizzle)

recipeInstructions.text: Remove seeds from rockmelon with a spoon. Cut into 8 wedges, peel each wedge then cut in half to make 16 pieces.
Combine mascarpone with basil and season with salt and pepper.
Cut prosciutto slices in half lengthways to make 16 long strips.
To assemble, put a rounded teaspoon of the mascarpone onto one side of a rockmelon piece. Wrap with a strip of prosciutto.
Arrange on a platter and drizzle with a little olive oil and a few drops of balsamic.
